original_text: It then went to the northern slope of Beth Hoglah and came out at the northern bay of the Dead Sea, at the mouth of the Jordan in the south. This was the southern boundary.
korean_text: 또 북으로 벧 호글라 곁을 지나서 요단 남쪽 끝에 있는 염해의 북쪽 해만이 그 경계의 끝이 되나니 이는 남쪽 경계며

sentences.original_text: It then went to the northern slope of Beth Hoglah
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 벳 호글라의 북쪽 경사지로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and came out at the northern bay of the Dead Sea
at the mouth of the Jordan in the south
